item.description:
Hi everyone. I apologize for deciding on the TBD movie at the last moment. I was hoping to find some consensus in the responses, which didn't happen until today. The movie is Conviction, starring Hilary Swank and Sam Rockwell.

Hilary Swank plays a Massachusetts mother whose older brother (Sam Rockwell) is sentenced to life in prison for murder. Convinced that he is innocent, she dedicates herself to overturning the conviction.

The movie is playing at 7:05 at Showcase in Worcester. Let's meet in the lobby at about 6:45. We can meetup for food and drinks and conversation afterwards. Call my cell phone if you need to contact me: 508-981-0455.

- David
item.how_to_find_us: I look like my photo - Not Josey Wales. The organizer photo.

group.name: The Worcester Movie Fans Meetup Group

item.name: Movie TBD - It's Conviction
